Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

##### How does the Flex add-on work?

The Flex add-on lets you register an unlimited number of users. The pricing is based on the number of different users that log in to your portal each month. The Flex add-on comes with soft limits. TalentLMS doesn’t prevent users from logging in if your plan limit has been reached. [More](https://help.talentlms.com/hc/en-us/articles/9652402239516-How-TalentLMS-subscription-plans-work)

##### What’s the difference between annual and monthly pricing?

Annual pricing allows you to secure your plan for a full year at a 20% discount compared to monthly pricing.

##### Do you offer plans with greater user limits?

Yes, our Enterprise plan can be tailored to any number of users. Contact us for more info on Enterprise plans.

##### Do I need a credit card to create an account?

No, you don’t need a credit card to create your account. Our Free plan also doesn’t have a time limit, so you’re free to use it for as long as you want!

##### Can I upgrade, downgrade, or cancel at any time?

Absolutely! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your account at any time. If you cancel your subscription, your portal will remain active until the end of your billing cycle.

##### Does my plan come with free support?

All plans come with unlimited support (yes, even the Free plan)! You can start a support ticket from your portal’s dashboard.

##### Are there course storage limits?

There are no storage limits on courses. The Free plan has a 100MB upload limit per file, and paid plans have a 600MB upload limit per file, but there’s no cap on your total portal storage.

##### Is TalentLibrary available on all plans?

Yes, TalentLibrary is available as an add-on with all plans and brackets, regardless of your number of users. It gives you unlimited access to the full catalog of ready-made courses.

##### Do you offer a nonprofit organization discount?

Yes! All registered nonprofit organizations using TalentLMS can receive a 20% discount on annual plan. To access your discount, sign up for a Free plan. Then, send us your portal name along with your nonprofit status documentation and a link to your organization’s website.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

##### How does the Flex add-on work?

The Flex add-on lets you register an unlimited number of users. The pricing is based on the number of different users that log in to your portal each month. The Flex add-on comes with soft limits. TalentLMS doesn’t prevent users from logging in if your plan limit has been reached. [More](https://help.talentlms.com/hc/en-us/articles/9652402239516-How-TalentLMS-subscription-plans-work)

##### What’s the difference between annual and monthly pricing?

Annual pricing allows you to secure your plan for a full year at a 20% discount compared to monthly pricing.

##### Do you offer plans with greater user limits?

Yes, our Enterprise plan can be tailored to any number of users. Contact us for more info on Enterprise plans.

##### Do I need a credit card to create an account?

No, you don’t need a credit card to create your account. Our Free plan also doesn’t have a time limit, so you’re free to use it for as long as you want!

##### Can I upgrade, downgrade, or cancel at any time?

Absolutely! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your account at any time. If you cancel your subscription, your portal will remain active until the end of your billing cycle.

##### Does my plan come with free support?

All plans come with unlimited support (yes, even the Free plan)! You can start a support ticket from your portal’s dashboard.

##### Are there course storage limits?

There are no storage limits on courses. The Free plan has a 100MB upload limit per file, and paid plans have a 600MB upload limit per file, but there’s no cap on your total portal storage.

##### Is TalentLibrary available on all plans?

Yes, TalentLibrary is available as an add-on with all plans and brackets, regardless of your number of users. It gives you unlimited access to the full catalog of ready-made courses.

##### Do you offer a nonprofit organization discount?

Yes! All registered nonprofit organizations using TalentLMS can receive a 20% discount on annual plan. To access your discount, sign up for a Free plan. Then, send us your portal name along with your nonprofit status documentation and a link to your organization’s website.
